routines: visits to electronics and hobby shops

This combination suggests he is open to new experiences, yet his consistent routines point to a preference for comfort and familiarity. With an agreeable and emotionally stable personality, he likely finds enjoyment in social settings without being overly extroverted and takes conscientious steps to balance his academic responsibilities with leisure.
